<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get User Ratings"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/me/ratings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get all mod rating's submitted by the _authenticated user_. Successful request will return an array of [Rating Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/rating-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game_id","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the parent game.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"mod_id","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the mod.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"rating","in":"query","description":"Type of rating applied:<br /><br />__-1__ = Negative Rating<br />__1__ = Positive Rating","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"resource_type","in":"query","description":"Type of resource:<br><br>__mods__ = Mod Ratings<br>__collections__ = Collection Ratings. Defaults to: mods.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"date_added","in":"query","description":"Unix timestamp of date rating was submitted.","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Request Successful","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Get User Ratings","properties":{"data":{"description":"Array containing rating objects.","items":{"title":"Rating Object","description":"Contains rating data.","properties":{"game_id":{"description":"Unique game id.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":2},"mod_id":{"description":"Unique mod id. Deprecated, use `resource_type` and `resource_id` instead.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":2},"resource_type":{"description":"Type of resource.","type":"string","default":"mods","enum":["mods","collections"]},"resource_id":{"description":"Unique id of the requested resource type.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":2},"rating":{"title":"Agreement Type Enum","type":"integer","enum":[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8],"x-enumDescriptions":{"TOU (1)":"Terms","PRIVACY (2)":"Privacy","GAME (3)":"Game","API (4)":"API","MONETIZATION (5)":"Monetization","AUP (6)":"AUP","COOKIES (7)":"Cookies","REFUND (8)":"Refund"}},"date_added":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date rating was submitted.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1492564103}},"type":"object"}},"result_count":{"description":"Number of results returned in this request.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":70},"result_offset":{"description":"Number of results skipped over. Defaults to 0 unless overridden by `_offset` filter.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"result_limit":{"description":"Maximum number of results returned in the request. Defaults to 100 (max) unless overridden by `_limit` filter.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":100},"result_total":{"description":"Total number of results found.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":70}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
